nome: Kaleido Star: Legend of Phoenix - Layla Hamilton Monogatari

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Kaleido Star: Legend of Phoenix - Layla Hamilton Monogatari
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: Kaleido Star: Legend of Phoenix - The Layla Hamilton Story
metadata_completo.sinopse: Layla is going to perform Phoenix in Broadway. Playing this important role, she sets out on a journey by bicycle alone without leaving any message in order to find out what she's missing inside.
